title: PM expresses grief over loss of lives, damages in Nepal floods
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 6 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Monday expressed his deep grief over the tragic loss of lives and extensive damage caused by the floods and landslides in Nepal.
On X account post, the prime minister extended his heartfelt condolences to the bereaved families of Nepal.
“The Government and people of Pakistan stand in solidarity with the Government and people of Nepal in these difficult moments,” he added.
